sections.heading: Chapter
sections.text:
does not permit chiropractic physician to practice medicine, osteopathic

medicine, dentistry, optometry or podiatry or administer or prescribe drugs

except in certain circumstances.

sections.text:

licensed to practice Oriental medicine; exceptions.
